name: SVR'd
description:
A game where you explore Lumonosity's headquarters and try to eliminate the scary numbers

Controls when in Bellingham mode:

  • A - Interact
  • B - Run (there's a setting for auto-run in Cairns mode)

Controls when in Dranesville mode:

  • A - Uncover
  • B + crank is Docked - flag as a scary number
  • B + crank is Undocked - mark as a potentially scary number
  • Cairns mode: Settings
  • Minsk mode: Music player

More rooms and minigames to come!

Version 2:

  • screen transitions now work both on entry and exit
  • bug fixes
  • all the rooms between the waiting room and to the parking lot have been added
